website_summaries.verdict: If you're hooked on the fine details achieved through graphite drawing, this versatile 54-piece pencil set is sure to open doors to new and exciting techniques.
pros: Contains most essential graphite pencils, ranging from 5H to 5B
Includes 10 vibrant color pencils, 10 metallic pencils, and 10 watercolor pencils for color and texture experimentation
The addition of 10 easy to sharpen charcoal pencils – hard, medium, and soft – allows for a comfortable and controlled introduction to the flexibility and freedom of charcoal drawing
cons: No 6B pencil, but if you're an avid sketcher, you probably already have one of these

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my boyfriend & I hope he loves it. I expected it to look better than how it came. There’s little damage done to it, I just wish they wasn’t noticeable. I really do hope he loves it! If I can give an update I will.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this art set. Amazing price for the quality of all that’s included! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AM82

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It came with some scraches and some bumps but its an OK case not so "profesional like"
customer_reviews.author: freejoseman

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved the set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 8 year old granddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present for my niece. She seemed to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin duffy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of product for the money. Everything is nicely packaged and there is a nice variety
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing art set, shipping was quick and everything was intact as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tabooflia Ravioli

customer_reviews.title: Pencils nice, box is not
customer_reviews.text: The box the items come in is cheap. The pencils are nice, and are working out well for the granddaughter they were a gift for.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas and she loved it it's very good apparently
customer_reviews.author: Evan justin

customer_reviews.title: Seems used
customer_reviews.text: My set came with a missing ruler and the box seems a little damaged with marks on it. Other than that my sister loved it and was happy but they could’ve done a better job with the actual material...
customer_reviews.author: Jahneese

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a friend who sketches- she loved it

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift! Everything came in one piece nothing was broken.

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive art set. My granddaughter received as birthday gift. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit haven’t really gotten to fully use but it’s great came in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Mark Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Draws very well but I waited 6 days to get it after i got the 2 day shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the colors were wrong, a few items were broke when I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this book for my 11 year old son who loves to sketch. He lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my cousin who is in his early 30’s. He likes to draw in his spare time and sometimes sells his drawings to tattoo shops and what not. He absolutely loved the gift and said he couldn’t wait to use it. I was unable to see it in person but I was happy he was excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I recently just got into drawing, and wanted the best quality set of colored pencils to start out with. And so far, I'm impressed. There are a wide variety of pencils in this set. The eraser definitely comes in handy. And it even comes with a pretty good small pencil sharpener. Overall, if you're involved with drawing and art...I'd say this set is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A Beginner May Find These Pencils Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I understand not having top quality color pencils for beginners, however brittle, gritty textures, chalky colors pencils and low pigment can be discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: D. Katherine

customer_reviews.title: a great birthday gift that isn't too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was a great birthday gift for my 14 year old son. He has gotten very interested in drawing the past year and this truly allows him to show his creativity.
customer_reviews.author: trinh martin

customer_reviews.title: Broken pencils
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit unfortunately the pencil keeps breaking off the tips overtime I sharpen it. Very weak graphite tips.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rosado

customer_reviews.title: ... my gf and needless to say she says they're amazing. The case is super convenient to keep everything ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my gf and needless to say she says they're amazing. The case is super convenient to keep everything organized and the soft touch of the pencils has already made a difference in her drawings. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Haven't got to give it to her yet but for all that comes with it I think it was a good price. I gave $10 just for my pencils ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for Christmas. Haven't got to give it to her yet but for all that comes with it I think it was a good price. I gave $10 just for my pencils like the ones that came in this at Walmart so this I thought was def a good deal for this whole set. The shipment was a day early also.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Nice art set.
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this set. I recommend buying this art set.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for young artist.
customer_reviews.text: For my young grandson who is an outstanding artist. Makes him feel like a professional. Great variety for a young artist looking to try different pencil mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice art set for non artists like myself. Now if I can just find the time to enjoy using them that would be perfect! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: a gorgeuos set of art materials that my daughter is enamored of and gives her lots of choices. very high quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: in good shade, looked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift! Came on time, in good shade, looked as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set for an even better price! Lots of variety for all types of art and fun to play with the different colors and textures.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pencils seem to be good quality they a a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Miguel D

product_meta.title: Sela Art-54 Pcs Professional Art Pencil Set! Great for Drawing and Coloring. All in one: Colored, Watercolor, Charcoal, Metallic, Sketch Pencils + 4 Accessories: Brush, Sharpener, Eraser, and Ruler !
product_meta.description:
A PROFESSIONAL ART PENCIAL SET THAT ANYONE WILL LOVE TO HAVE!

*Are you looking to buy a High Quality Art Pencil Pack?
*Are you looking for the perfect gift for someone? 
*Do you feel the need for professional art pencils to bring your creativity to life?

If the answer to any of the above was yes then this premium quality art pencil pack is exactly what you need to bring life to your imagination and let your creativity free in order to make truly stunning designs, sketches, drawing and anything else you might wish.

50 Pencil Set For Professional Drawing, sketching, Coloring + 4 Extra Accessories 

We believe in providing the best value for money which is why we only provide the highest quality art pencils for drawing along with offering the best and useful extra accessories that no one else offers.

 Each pack of our professional art pencil packs contains the following:

• 10 Sketch Pencils:5H,4H,3H,2H,HB,B,2B,3B,4B,5B

• 10 Colored Pencils:Brown, Orange, blue light, Blue, Green, LightGreen, Pink, Red, Yellow, Black.

• 10 Metallic Pencils:Gold, Silver, Blue, Black, Violet, Olive, Green, Lavender, Indigo, Brown.

• 10 Charcoal Pencils: 3 medium, 4 hard, 3 soft.

• 10Water Color Pencils: Blue, Light Blue, Black, Green, Light Green, Pink, Orange, Yellow, Red, Brown.

• 4 Extra Accessories: Brush, Eraser, Sharpener, and Ruler!


Each of our pencils are made with the maximum care and attention to make sure they can be as flawless as possible. Our professional at pencils look like classic art pencils because we appreciate the genuine feeling of wood and classic design

We truly care about our customers and only provide quality that both we and our customers can be happy about !
feature_bullets: 54 PCS PROFESSIONAL ART PENCIL SET: 10 Sketching Pencils (5H,4H,3H,2H,HB,B,2B,3B,4B,5B),10 Colored Pencils (Brown, Orange, blue light, Blue, Green, Light Green, Pink, Red, Yellow, Black), 10 Metallic Pencils (Gold, Silver, Blue, Black, Violet, Olive, Green, Lavender, Indigo, Brown), 10 Charcoal Pencils (3 Medium, 4 Hard, 3 Soft), 10 Watercolor Pencils (Blue, Light Blue, Black, Green, Light Green, Pink, Orange, Yellow, Red, Brown) and 4 accessories!

UNMATCHED QUALITY: With other art sets you can either choose quality or quantity but with this high quality art pencil set we throw that out the window and provide you with the best quality and quantity that you can hope to find. Each pencil is made with the utmost care and precision to make them durable and ideal for drawing, layering, sketching and even office use.

SYMMETRICAL AND STYLISH: More than often we lose track of our pencils and coloring equipment simply because we have no place to store them safely. We provide these art pencils packed in stylish packaging that has designated areas for each pencil to be stored.

THE PERFECT GIFT: In this day and age when finding a gift for someone you need to make sure that it actually has some educational value as well as being fun. This professional art pencil set is fun, educational and something any teen or adult that likes to draw or would like to learn drawing love to have. This is the ideal drawing gift for occasions like Christmas, Birthdays, Easter or any other occasion. With this set you can bring any design to life!

DESIGNED BY ARTISTS FOR ARTISTS: This professional art pencil set was designed by artist keeping in mind the needs of current artists as well as the needs of people that strive to become artists or just love to have a great time drawing, sketching, layering or even drawing manga. We believe in providing the best value for money ! you get also 4 additional accessories (Brush, Eraser, Sharpener, and Ruler) so that you have everything you need to free the artist within you.
